Package javatro.manager

package javatro.manager
The manager package contains the core game management and command execution logic. It follows the Command design pattern to handle various user actions and game state changes.

This package is responsible for managing game flow, handling user commands, and coordinating between the game model and the user interface.

Classes in this package:

  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.Command - Interface defining executable game commands.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.DiscardCardsCommand - Command for discarding selected cards.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.ExitGameCommand - Command for terminating the game.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.JavatroManager - Central controller managing game state and user input.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.LoadGameScreenCommand - Command for starting the game and loading the game screen.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.LoadOptionsScreenCommand - Command for displaying the options menu.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.LoadStartScreenCommand - Command for displaying the main menu.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.MakeSelectionCommand - Command for selecting cards to play or discard.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.PlayCardsCommand - Command for playing selected cards.
  • javatro.Javatro.Manager.ResumeGameCommand - Command for returning to the main game screen.

    Description
    JavatroManager
    The JavatroManager class serves as the main controller (manager) of the game, coordinating interactions between the model (JavatroCore) and the view (display).
